    • Method Detail

      • getMACString

        public java.lang.String getMACString(boolean dots)
        Returns the MAC address as a string.
        Parameters:
        dots - If true, then the format is "AA.BB...." instead of "AA:BB:...".
        Returns:
        Returns the MAC address in the selected format.

      • getRemoteMACString

        public java.lang.String getRemoteMACString(boolean dots)
        Returns the remote MAC address (the device this WLAN unit is connected to) as a string.
        Parameters:
        dots - If true, then the format is "AA.BB...." instead of "AA:BB:...".
        Returns:
        Returns the MAC address in the selected format.
